Group Income

Group Income

Private community software with a financial safety net, so you can focus on what matters.

What is Group Income?

A safe space to financially support each other.

Help guarantee access to fundamental needs, independent of life circumstances in a safe and private environment thanks to end-to-end encryption.

Learn more about Basic Income.Read more about our privacy and security.
Why it matters

Every individual is valuable.

Many people contribute to our lives and our society, but are often not financially rewarded. From students to unpaid careers, from volunteers to care givers, from unemployed people to unwell.

Basic Income can improve the quality of life for millions of people, simply through providing them with basic financial security and the peace of mind that goes with it.

Learn more about Basic Income.
Set a "mincome" floor

Create your own financial safety net.

Create stronger communities and ensure basic financial security for the people you care about — set a minimum income floor ("mincome"). Each month, group members help those who haven't crossed the mincome threshold.

Try out the payments simulator.
Non-monetary Contributions

Everyone has something to offer.

Members of the group can contribute with monetary or non-monetary donations, securing everyone in your group with a basic income, independent of employment.

Empower Your Community

The best private chat for your community.

A powerful community chat with emoji reactions, polls, file attachments, and more — all completely private and end-to-end encrypted.

Stay Safe

Security & Privacy

Group Income is built on top of an end-to-end encrypted protocol called Shelter Protocol. Your data is stored in encrypted form on servers, and decrypted locally on your device. The keys to decrypt that data are derived from your password and are also stored on your device.

Read more about our privacy and security.

Group Income is end-to-end encrypted and self-hosted.

Here's how to get started:
Choose a Server
Use our official server, choose from a list of independently operated servers, or run your own!
Create an account
Group Income doesn't use cookies to manage user accounts. Read more about our technology
Join a Group and Start Sharing!
Contribute with monetary or non-monetary donations and secure everyone in your group with a basic income.
